00023 #include <vle/devs/Executive.hpp>
00024 #include <vle/devs/ExecutiveDbg.hpp>
00025 
00026 class Executive : public vle::devs::Executive
00027 {
00028 public:
00029     Executive(const vle::devs::ExecutiveInit& init,
00030               const vle::devs::InitEventList& events) :
00031     vle::devs::Executive(init, events)
00032     { }
00033 
00034     virtual ~Executive() { }
00035 
00036     void addConnectionsWithBuffer(unsigned int index,
00037                                   const std::string& modelName,
00038                                   const std::string& previousModelName)
00039     {
00040         if (index != 1) {
00041             removeConnection("Buffer", "ThermalTime", previousModelName, "ThermalTime");
00042             removeConnection("Buffer", "ActionTemp", previousModelName, "ActionTemp");
00043             removeConnection("Buffer", "TempEff", previousModelName, "TempEff");
00044             removeConnection("Buffer", "OutDeposition", previousModelName, "InDeposition");
00045         }
00046         if (index == 1) {
00047             removeConnection(previousModelName, "update", "Buffer", "InDeposition");
00048         } else {
00049             removeConnection(previousModelName, "OutDeposition", "Buffer", "InDeposition");
00050         }
00051         addConnection(modelName, "OutDeposition", "Buffer", "InDeposition");
00052 
00053         addConnection("Buffer", "ThermalTime", modelName, "ThermalTime");
00054         addConnection("Buffer", "ActionTemp", modelName, "ActionTemp");
00055         addConnection("Buffer", "TempEff", modelName, "TempEff");
00056         addConnection("Buffer", "OutDeposition", modelName, "InDeposition");
00057     }
00058     
00059     void addModel()
00060     {
00061         for (List::const_iterator it = mAddList.begin();
00062                  it != mAddList.end(); ++it) {
00063             std::string previous((vle::fmt("Unit_%1%") % ((*it) - 1)).str());
00064             std::string current((vle::fmt("Unit_%1%") % (*it)).str());
00065 
00066             // Edition de la valeur d'un paramètre variable entre unité
00067             vle::vpz::Condition& cnd = conditions().get("condParametres");
00068             cnd.clearValueOfPort("P_UnitTTExp");
00069             cnd.addValueToPort("P_UnitTTExp", new vle::value::Double(P_UnitTTExp));
00070             cnd.clearValueOfPort("P_UnitTTSen");
00071             cnd.addValueToPort("P_UnitTTSen", new vle::value::Double(P_UnitTTSen));
00072             
00073             // Creation des unites fonctionnelles           
00074             createModelFromClass("Unit", current); 
00075             
00076             // Creation des connections entrantes
00077             addConnection("Initiation", "AreaLatent", current, "perturb");
00078             addConnection("CropClimate", "ActionTemp", current, "ActionTemp");
00079             addConnection("CropPhenology", "TempEff", current, "TempEff");
00080             addConnection("CropPhenology", "ThermalTime", current, "ThermalTime");
00081             
00082             // Creation des ports entrants sur le modèle de somme (passage unité -> couvert)
00083             addInputPort("CropScaling", (vle::fmt("%1%_AreaActive") % current).str());            
00084             
00085             // Creation des connections sortantes
00086             addConnection(current, "AreaActive", "CropScaling", (vle::fmt("%1%_AreaActive") % current).str());
00087                         
00088             // Création des connections entre unités : flux de spores
00089             if (*it != 1) {
00090                 addConnection(previous, "OutDeposition", current, "InDeposition");
00091             } else {
00092                 addConnection("Unit_0", "update", current, "InDeposition");
00093             }
00094             
00095             // Creation des connections avec le buffer
00096             addConnectionsWithBuffer(*it, current, previous);
00097         }
00098     }
00099     
00100     vle::devs::Time init(const vle::devs::Time& /* time */)
00101     {
00102         mPhase = IDLE;
00103         mOk = false;
00104         return vle::devs::Time::infinity;
00105     }
00106 
00107     void output(const vle::devs::Time& /* time */,
00108                 vle::devs::ExternalEventList& output) const
00109     {
00110         if (mPhase == SEND) {
00111             for (List::const_iterator it = mAddList.begin();
00112                  it != mAddList.end(); ++it) {
00113                 std::string modelName((boost::format("Unit_%1%_AreaActive") %
00114                                        (*it)).str());
00115                 output.addEvent(buildEventWithAString("add", "name",
00116                                                       modelName));
00117             }
00118             output.addEvent(buildEvent("send"));
00119         }
00120     }
00121 
00122     vle::devs::Time timeAdvance() const
00123     {
00124         if (mPhase == IDLE) {
00125             return vle::devs::Time::infinity;
00126         } else if (mPhase == SEND) {
00127             return 0;
00128         }
00129         return vle::devs::Time::infinity;
00130     }
00131 
00132     void internalTransition(const vle::devs::Time& /* time */)
00133     {
00134         if (mPhase == SEND) {
00135             mAddList.clear();
00136             mPhase = IDLE;
00137         }
00138     }
00139 
00140     // Recoit les demandes du pilote
00141     void externalTransition(const vle::devs::ExternalEventList& events,
00142                             const vle::devs::Time& /* time */)
00143     {
00144         vle::devs::ExternalEventList::const_iterator it = events.begin();
00145 
00146         while (it != events.end()) {
00147             if ((*it)->onPort("add")) {
00148                 unsigned int index = (*it)->getIntegerAttributeValue("index");
00149                 P_UnitTTExp = (*it)->getDoubleAttributeValue("P_UnitTTExp");
00150                 P_UnitTTSen = (*it)->getDoubleAttributeValue("P_UnitTTSen");
00151 
00152                 mAddList.push_back(index);
00153                 if (mOk) {
00154                     addModel();
00155                     mPhase = SEND;
00156                     mOk = false;
00157                 } else {
00158                     mPhase = WAITING;
00159                 }
00160             } else if ((*it)->onPort("ok")) {
00161                 mOk = true;
00162                 if (mPhase == WAITING) {
00163                     addModel();
00164                     mPhase = SEND;
00165                     mOk = false;
00166                 }
00167             } else if ((*it)->onPort("cancel")) {
00168                 mOk = false;
00169             }
00170             ++it;
00171         }
00172     }
00173 
00174 private:
00175     typedef std::vector < unsigned int > List;
00176     enum phase { IDLE, WAITING, SEND };
00177 
00178     phase mPhase;
00179     List mAddList;
00180     bool mOk;
00181     double P_UnitTTExp;
00182     double P_UnitTTSen;
00183 };
00184

00186 DECLARE_NAMED_EXECUTIVE_DBG(UnitConstruction, Executive)
